en.select: Hello, Your friend {friend} is now online. {gender, select, female {She} male {He} other {They}} added a new image to the system.

en.money: Buy now to save {amount, number, currency:GBP}
en.time: Sale begins {start, time, short} at {start, date, short}
en.integer: The integer value of {amount} is {amount, number, integer}
